hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a bed and a door to a balcony at Le Lithana in Pontorson
description: Located in the town centre of Pontorson, this hotel is just 10 km south of the famous Mont St-Michel. It offers a restaurant with a terrace and an interior courtyard. A private parking is at guests' disposal.

hostel_name: Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie
hostel_alt_img: a pool in a large room with a wooden floor at Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie in Roz-sur-Couesnon
description: The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie all rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

hostel_alt_img: a woman sitting in a room with bunk beds at L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel in Pontorson
description: A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel.

hostel_alt_img: a patio with tables and chairs and a fountain at Hôtel Ariane & SPA in Pontorson
description: Each bedroom has a contemporary design, a TV and a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a bathtub and a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Hotel Ariane.

hostel_name: ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel
hostel_alt_img: a castle on an island in a field of grass at ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel in Saint-Georges-de-Gréhaigne
description: At the hotel, all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe. The rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with two beds and a green wall at Hôtel Vert in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

hostel_name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud (Inter-Hotel)
hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a large bed and a chair at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud (Inter-Hotel) in Roz-sur-Couesnon
description: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is located just a 10-minute drive from Le Mont Saint Michel and a 35-minute drive from Saint Malo.

hostel_name: Vacancéole - Le Domaine du Mont - Mont St Michel
hostel_alt_img: an apartment building with a tree in front of it at Vacancéole - Le Domaine du Mont - Mont St Michel in Roz-sur-Couesnon
description: Located just 18 km from Mont Saint Michel in Roz-Sur-Couesnon,  Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont offers a shaded outdoor terrace. Some of the rooms are air conditioned.

hostel_name: Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais (Relais du Silence)
hostel_alt_img: a large house with a gazebo in a yard at Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais (Relais du Silence) in Courtils
description: Located in Courtils, Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais is 10 km from the Mont-Saint-Michel. It offers free WiFi access, a garden and views of the Mont-Saint-Michel Abbey. The hotel’s restaurant is set in a conservatory.

hostel_alt_img: Gallery image of Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel in Beauvoir
description: Situated in Beauvoir, 5.4 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and terrace.

hostel_alt_img: a restaurant with tables and chairs and a purple door at Le Beauvoir in Beauvoir
description: Le Beauvoir is located just 4 kilometres from Mont Saint Michel and a 20-minute drive from Cancale. It offers free private parking and a restaurant.

hostel_alt_img: an old house next to a body of water at Hotel Rose in Beauvoir
description: Composed of thoughtfully designed independent bungalows and guestrooms in the annex house of a 19th-century building, Hotel Rose offers comfortable accommodation and a peaceful atmosphere.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a bed with two pillows at Auberge de la Baie in Ardevon
description: This hotel is situated in the countryside of Normandy and offers free Wi-Fi and an on-site restaurant with a terrace.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a bed and a desk and a bed sidx sidx at Hôtel la Croix Blanche in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

hostel_alt_img: a restaurant with wooden tables and chairs and a chandelier at Auberge Saint Pierre in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: The guest rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms have views of the sea.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with two beds and a window at Le Relais Du Roy in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 m from the free shuttle bus.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a tray of food on a bed at Hotel Gabriel in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a large bed with pillows at La Vieille Auberge in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb. One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view. They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a large bed and windows at La Mère Poulard in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Housed in a historical building, this hotel is ideally located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel. The classic-style rooms overlook the bay, the abbey or the medieval city.

hostel_alt_img: a large bed in a hotel room with two windows at Hotel De La Digue in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Each of the spacious guest rooms at the Hotel De La Digue are brightly decorated and are equipped with a TV. Some of the double rooms have a view of the Couesnon River.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a bed and a room with a balcony at Le Relais Saint Michel in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.

hostel_alt_img: a bathroom with a sink and a phone on the wall at Le Saint Aubert in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

hostel_alt_img: a bed with red pillows next to a window at Les Terrasses Poulard in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

hostel_alt_img: a castle on an island in the water at Le Mouton Blanc in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

hostel_alt_img: a living room with a blue wall and bookshelves at Mercure Mont Saint Michel in Le Mont Saint Michel
description: The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks.  A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a large bed with boots on it at La Maison des Armateurs in Saint Malo
description: The rooms at La Maison des Armateurs have a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each one is air-conditioned and also includes a wardrobe and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a bed and a table and a window at Le Britannic in Saint Malo
description: All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. At Le Britannic the rooms have bed linen and towels.

hostel_alt_img: a building with a palm tree in a parking lot at ibis Saint-Malo Madeleine in Saint Malo
description: Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with international channels. Each room offers en suite bathroom facilities.

hostel_name: Hôtel La Porte Saint Pierre-Logis Hôtel Intra Muros
hostel_alt_img: a body of water with a rope in the water at Hôtel La Porte Saint Pierre-Logis Hôtel Intra Muros in Saint Malo
description: Situated inside the historic walls of Saint-Malo’s old town, this hotel is just 10 m from the beach.

hostel_alt_img: a room with chairs and a table and a large window at Hotel Alba in Saint Malo
description: Each room has simple décor and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a large white bed and a desk at Hôtel Le Nautilus in Saint Malo
description: All the rooms feature soundproofing, a desk and satellite TV. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The bed linen has been upgraded for a 5 stars sleep quality.
A breakfast buffet is served daily.

hostel_alt_img: a living room with a leather couch and a glass table at Hôtel de la Cité in Saint Malo
description: The Hôtel de la Cité is located in the heart of Saint-Malo, just 350 m from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and rooms with sea views.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a large bed and a table at Hotel Aubade in Saint Malo
description: The Aubade is a boutique hotel with free Wi-Fi in the centre of Saint-Malo, close to the Old Town and the beach and 1 km from Saint-Malo Marina and Saint-Malo Train Station. Free WiFi is available.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a large bed with a painting on the wall at Hotel Ar Terra Nova in Saint Malo
description: Every room comes with a flat-screen TV. All rooms include a private bathroom. Hotel Ar Terra Nova features free WiFi throughout the property.

hostel_alt_img: a large white building with the words bar breakfast pizzeria at La Rotonde in Saint Malo
description: This hotel is located in the seaside resort of Saint-Malo, 50 m from the beach. Free Wi-Fi access and a TV are provided in the non-smoking guest rooms.

hostel_alt_img: a hotel room with a bed and a painting on the wall at ibis Styles Saint Malo Port in Saint Malo
description: Each of the contemporary rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe. They all have a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

hostel_alt_img: a room with tables and chairs and red curtains at Alpha Ocean in Saint Malo
description: Guests of the Alpha Ocean Hotel can relax with a drink in the bar or on the terrace with sea view. On Sunday, you can enjoy an aperitif with the famous Cancale oysters. The hotel’s staff can also provide local tourist information.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with two beds and a vase of flowers at Domaine de la Barbinais in Saint Malo
description: Each individually decorated room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. Each also includes a private bathroom with a  shower and a hairdryer.

hostel_alt_img: a kitchen with wooden cabinets and a table with chairs at Hotel Ajoncs d'Or in Saint Malo
description: Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom and satellite TV. Rooms are accessible by a lift.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a bed and a desk and a chair at Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros in Saint Malo
description: Located in Saint Malo, 400 m from Saint-Malo Casino, Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros has a number of amenities including a terrace, a shared lounge, a bar and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 400 m from Cale de Dinan Ferry, 600 m from Espace Duguay Trouin and 600 m from Palais du Grand Large.

hostel_alt_img: a large building on the beach in front of the water at Grand Hôtel Des Thermes in Saint Malo
description: All guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and internet access. Some stylish guest rooms include a lounge and offer views over the city.

hostel_alt_img: a large white building next to the ocean at Hôtel de France et Chateaubriand in Saint Malo
description: The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand is located in the heart of the historic city of Saint Malo, 210 m from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers breathtaking views over the sea and le sillon.

hostel_alt_img: a bedroom with a bed and a chair and a window at Escale Oceania Saint Malo in Saint Malo
description: Escale Oceania Saint-Malo is located on the seafront, facing the Sillon Beach and a 14-minute walk from Saint-Malo Train Station. It offers modern rooms, a sunny outdoor terrace and 24 hour-a-day food service.

hostel_alt_img: a city skyline at night with a river and buildings at Oceania Saint Malo in Saint Malo
description: The Oceania Saint Malo hotel faces the sea and is located on Chaussée du Sillon, opposite Sillon Beach and 450 m from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers luxurious rooms and guests have free access to spa area and swimming pool.

hostel_name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel des Marins, Saint-Malo (Inter-Hotel)
hostel_alt_img: a lit up building on a street at night at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel des Marins, Saint-Malo (Inter-Hotel) in Saint Malo
description: Renovated in 2019, the soundproofed guest rooms feature extra long beds and interconnecting rooms are available. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

hostel_alt_img: a group of buildings on the beach near the ocean at Hôtel Le Nouveau Monde in Saint Malo
description: The spacious guest rooms at Hôtel Le Nouveau Monde are decorated in a contemporary style and have views of the town or the sea. Free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV are provided in each soundproofed room.

hostel_alt_img: a statue of a woman standing in a room at Hotel d'Aleth in Saint Malo
description: The rooms at Hotel d'Aleth are decorated in a contemporary style and include an LCD TV. Each one also provides an en suite bathroom, while some feature a private balcony with sea views.

hostel_alt_img: a street with tables and chairs in front of buildings at Hotel De L'univers in Saint Malo
description: Rooms are comfortable and equipped with TV, telephone and private bathroom.

hostel_alt_img: a woman and two children sitting in a swimming pool at Residence Reine Marine in Saint Malo
description: An exceptional location. A panoramic view of the islands and the bay of Saint-Malo. Direct access to the beach (no roads), convenient for residents and ideal for children. Saint-Malo is a great holiday location for all the family with cultural and sporting events throughout the year : literary festivals, boat races and regattas, exhibitions...
